translated: Duccio (born around 1255-1260 and died about 1318-1319) was the greatest Sienese painter of his time; its importance is even European.
original: Duccio di Buoninsegna (né vers 1255-1260 et mort vers 1318-1319) fut à son époque le plus grand peintre siennois ; son importance est même européenne.
